body:
First of all I want to say im very sorry for the things that ive said after I beat somebody like "You Suck" or "Lol to eZ". The thing is I dont really mean that, And im sorry if you dont like my post on the fourms cause nobody really reads them :/... Ok when I first started playing minecraft one of the first servers I knew was a kit pvp server (Only 20 people on TOPS), I suddenly got very interested in pvp so started playing that ALOT. I played so much  they banned me for hacking because my arrow would almost always hit them even from across the map, the person that banned me said the console said I was hacking, But I showed him proof on skype and finally got unbanned, On the scoreboard I was the underdog, nobody really heard of me and I was slowly making my way up, finally I was in the top 2 It was me vs. the owner, As I played a ton he couldnt really match up to me cause he is in high school, I finally got over 2000 kills and ×4 his amount of kills, sadly as almost no people logged anymore he closed it down :( This forced me to go to another server, This meant more people, and better pvp skills, One of them I had to get checked for hacking again, But the people were wayyyyy better so I could barely get a kill, when I did I wanted to show everyone by saying stuff like that, Now its now, I need to change cause I have a small little youtube channel going (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCrr220g5TwPq6bKDJZCVXLg), and im way better at pvp, the reason I only really do this is only when they start doing it to me or saying I suck. But for everybody, I will be changing, I will not be cocky, rude, and I will try not to post so much things on the fourms :/  This has been a amazing journey with you guys and will not hopefully be leaving any time soon. And some people might not of seen my other side of which I am rude, I actually only do this like 1 time a day, Now it will be 0 times a day. I hope you guys enjoyed this post cause this took me forever to write :) And heres a meme I made, I dont know if people have already made it but here it is!

I hope I can become friends with all of you!
Thank you and goodbye!
-Ebirdy9

title: Im Sorry, I Will Be Changing...Please Read D:

replies.body: I can relate about that. I have a very bad reputation on YouTube (comment section) and MC. I'm also trying my best to stop A) swearing B)Being rude and cocky{I even got warned for that}) The only thing is that all my friends swear so its pretty hard :/ Mabey we can talk and play together some time and record! :)
replies.body_tagged: I can relate about that. I have a very bad reputation on YouTube (comment section) and MC. I'm also trying my best to stop A) swearing B)Being rude and cocky{I even got warned for that}) The only thing is that all my friends swear so its pretty hard :/ Mabey we can talk and play together some time and record! :)
